trans-unit.source: Represents a new instance of the PeerObject class with an auto-generated <see cref="T:System.Guid" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 PeerObject 类的一个新实例，此实例具有自动生成的 <see cref="T:System.Guid" />。

trans-unit.source: A PeerObject is run-time data, such as a picture, certificate, or a specific description that is associated with a particular application.
trans-unit.target: PeerObject 是运行时数据，如图片、 证书或与特定应用程序关联的特定说明。

trans-unit.source: The data element of each PeerObject instance must be less than or equal to 16KB in size.
trans-unit.target: 每个 PeerObject 实例的数据元素必须小于或等于 16 KB 的大小。

trans-unit.source: After an instance of PeerObject is constructed it is published with the Peer Collaboration Infrastructure via <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 构造的 PeerObject 实例之后通过在对等协作基础结构发布<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>。

trans-unit.source: After constructing an instance of this class and setting the appropriate properties this object may be passed to the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration><xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> and <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.DeleteObject%2A> methods to enable/disable the publishing of this object for other peers to discover and view.
trans-unit.target: 可在构造此类的实例并设置此对象的适当的属性传递到后<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration><xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>和<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.DeleteObject%2A>方法来启用/禁用此对象发现和查看其他对等节点的发布。

trans-unit.source: After registering an object with the collaboration infrastructure the registration information is not persisted in the registry, resulting in different behavior from <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication> instances.
trans-unit.target: 注册对象与协作基础结构的注册信息不会保留在注册表中后，导致从不同的行为<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerApplication>实例。

trans-unit.source: The object registration is only valid for the lifetime duration of the application which registered the object.
trans-unit.target: 对象注册的应用程序注册该对象的生存期持续时间内才有效。

trans-unit.source: Applications should unregister objects when they are no longer required or prior to application exit.
trans-unit.target: 当不再需要或在应用程序之前退出时，应用程序应取消注册对象。

trans-unit.source: By default, a PeerObject is automatically unregistered if the instance goes out of scope.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，PeerObject 是自动注销，如果实例超出范围。

trans-unit.source: Changing the properties on a PeerObject instance after it has been registered using the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration> registration methods will not update the registration for the PeerObject instance.
trans-unit.target: 更改 PeerObject 实例上的属性，而注册使用后<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration>注册方法不会更新 PeerObject 实例注册。

trans-unit.source: To effectively update the registration of a specific PeerObject instance, the PeerObject must be deleted and registered again with the new information.
trans-unit.target: 若要有效地更新特定 PeerObject 实例注册，必须删除 PeerObject 并将其再次注册使用新信息。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> instance is constructed, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> method must be called to publish the object with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>构造实例，<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>必须调用方法以发布到对等协作基础结构的对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new default instance of the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 类的新默认实例。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> instance is constructed, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> method must be called to publish the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>构造实例，<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>必须调用方法来发布<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>在对等协作基础结构。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The serialization destination associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 相关联的序列化目标。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance with the associated parameters required for serialization.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化所需的关联参数初始化一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The user-defined identifier for the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 的用户定义标识符。

trans-unit.source: A data blob that contains information about the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含有关 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 的信息的数据 Blob。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is limited a size that is less than or equal to 16K.
trans-unit.target: 此参数的大小必须小于或等于 16K。

trans-unit.source: Specifies the scope in which the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> is to be registered.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 的注册范围。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance with the associated scope and data.
trans-unit.target: 使用关联的范围和数据初始化一个新的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The `Id` parameter value utilized by this constructor is auto generated.
trans-unit.target: `Id`利用此构造函数的参数值是自动生成。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> instance is constructed, the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A> method must be called to publish the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject> with the Peer Collaboration infrastructure.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>构造实例，<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerCollaboration.SetObject%2A>必须调用方法来发布<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject>在对等协作基础结构。

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to this method is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 为此方法提供的一个参数无效。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets descriptive data associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance for a Peer Collaboration application.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置与对等方协作基础结构的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例关联的描述性数据。

trans-unit.source: Descriptive data (such as text or a small image) associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 关联的描述性数据（例如文本或小图像）。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: One of the arguments provided to this method is not valid.
trans-unit.target: 为此方法提供的一个参数无效。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources utilized by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 利用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources utilized by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 利用的所有资源。

trans-unit.source: Set to <see langword="true" /> to release both managed and unmanaged resources; <see langword="false" /> to release only unmanaged resources.
trans-unit.target: 设置为 <see langword="true" /> 可释放托管资源和非托管资源；设置为 <see langword="false" /> 只能释放非托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> and optionally releases the managed resources.
trans-unit.target: 释放由 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 与指定的对象进行比较。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要进行相等性测试的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Compares a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> to the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 与指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance provided has matching data, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例具有匹配的数据，则返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance specified by <paramref name="other" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放由 <paramref name="other" /> 指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The object to test for equality.
trans-unit.target: 要测试相等的对象。

trans-unit.source: Compares the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> to the specified object.
trans-unit.target: 将 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 与指定的对象进行比较。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例具有匹配的数据，则返回 <see langword="true" />；

trans-unit.source: instance provided has matching data, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: The object specified by <paramref name="obj" /> has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放由 <paramref name="obj" /> 指定的对象。

trans-unit.source: The first <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: The second <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instances are considered equal.
trans-unit.target: 确定指定的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例是否可视为相等的实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instances provided have matching data, else <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果提供的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例具有匹配的数据，则返回 <see langword="true" />；否则返回 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code used to compare instances of this type.
trans-unit.target: 一个 32 位的有符号整数哈希代码，用于比较此类型的实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> instance to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填充数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> with the data required to serialize the specified <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 使用序列化指定的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> 所需的数据填充 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: A derived type must call the base type <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 派生的类型必须调用基类型 <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable.GetObjectData%2A> 方法。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置一个与 <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 实例关联的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> associated with the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Guid" /> 与相关联 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Signaled when a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance changes.
trans-unit.target: 在 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例更改时发出信号。

trans-unit.source: Before this event can be signaled by an object change, subscriptions must be made to the specified remote peer via the <xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 此事件可以指示实时编码器由对象更改之前，必须对通过指定的远程对等进行订阅<xref:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerContact.Subscribe%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Type of object change specified by <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ObjectChangedEventArgs" />.
trans-unit.target: 对象更改的类型，由 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.ObjectChangedEventArgs" /> 指定。

trans-unit.source: Signaled when a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance with the specified ID is added, updated or removed by a remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 在远程对等方添加、更新或移除具有指定 ID 的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例时发出信号。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance associated with this change has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 与该更改关联的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例已处理。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> in which the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance is registered.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置要在其中注册 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerScope" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />。

trans-unit.source: PeerScope that specifies the scope in which the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> is registered.
trans-unit.target: 指定 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 的注册范围的 PeerScope。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object used to marshal the event handler calls that are issued as a result of a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance change.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置用于封送因 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例更改而发出的事件处理程序调用的对象。

trans-unit.source: Object with an implementation of the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> interface.
trans-unit.target: 具有 <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.ISynchronizeInvoke" /> 接口的实现的对象。

trans-unit.source: This object is used for event handler synchronization.
trans-unit.target: 此对象用于事件处理程序同步。

trans-unit.source: The calling object has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放调用对象。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" /> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: 要填充数据的 <see cref="T:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo" />。

trans-unit.source: The destination for the serialization.
trans-unit.target: 此序列化的目标。

trans-unit.source: Populates the current <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance with the data obtained from the serialized source.
trans-unit.target: 使用从已序列化的源中获取的数据填充当前的 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。

trans-unit.source: Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> that represents a <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance.
trans-unit.target: 返回表示 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.String" /> representing the <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 的 <see cref="T:System.String" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> instance has been disposed.
trans-unit.target: 已释放了 <see cref="T:System.Net.PeerToPeer.Collaboration.PeerObject" /> 实例。
